DataElement.preferredName: Post Procedure Analgesics Over the Counter Product Combination Recommendation Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the quantity of days related to advice of combination of analgesic agents (pain alleviating compounds), which can be bought without a doctor's prescription, after procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Procedure Analgesics Over the Counter Product Combination Recommendation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to advice of combination of analgesic agents (pain alleviating compounds), which can be bought without a doctor's prescription, after procedure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.:Drugs that reduce pain. These drugs include aspirin, acetaminophen, and ibuprofen.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Compounds that alleviate pain without loss of consciousness.  Analgesics act by various mechanisms including binding with opioid receptors and decreasing inflammation.  Choice of analgesic may be determined by the type of pain.  These compounds include opioid, non-opioid and adjuvant analgesic agents.

Property.preferredName: Over the Counter Product Combination Recommendation
Property.preferredDefinition: A medicine or device that can be bought without a doctor's order or prescription.:A collection of things that have been assembled together to form a new whole.:Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: A medicine or device that can be bought without a doctor's order or prescription.
A collection of things that have been assembled together to form a new whole.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.

DataElement.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
